response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a valuable asset. Considering its worth to us and its value to you, I propose a price of $110 for this product. This offer allows you to benefit from its high-quality features while also ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. I believe this price strikes a great balance between value and affordability. Would you like to proceed with this offer?", "product_price": 110}
